languages.text: "В этом и кроется причина твоей неудачи, обожженный мон-кай. Ты мыслил узко, подобно типичным представителям своего вида".
"And therein lies the reason for your failure, burnt mon-keigh. Your mind was narrow, as the minds of your kind are wont to be."
languages.original_text: "В этом и кроется причина твоей неудачи, обожженный мон-кай. Ты мыслил узко, подобно типичным представителям своего вида".

traits.locale_text: "And therein lies the reason for your failure, burnt mon-keigh. Your mind was narrow, as the minds of your kind are wont to be."
"And therein lies the reason for your failure, burnt mon-keigh. Your mind was narrow, as the minds of your kind are wont to be."
"And therein lies the reason for your failure, burnt mon-keigh. Your mind was narrow, as the minds of your kind are wont to be."
"And therein lies the reason for your failure, burnt mon-keigh. Your mind was narrow, as the minds of your kind are wont to be."
"And therein lies the reason for your failure, burnt mon-keigh. Your mind was narrow, as the minds of your kind are wont to be."

languages.text: « Et voilà la raison de votre échec, mon-keigh. Vous avez l'esprit étriqué des vôtres. »
languages.original_text: "And therein lies the reason for your failure, burnt mon-keigh. Your mind was narrow, as the minds of your kind are wont to be."

traits.locale_text: « Et voilà la raison de votre échec, mon-keigh. Vous avez l'esprit étriqué des vôtres.

languages.text: “这正是你失败的原因，烧坏了脸的猴子。你与你的其他做人一样，你们的思想过于狭隘。”
languages.original_text: "And therein lies the reason for your failure, burnt mon-keigh. Your mind was narrow, as the minds of your kind are wont to be."

traits.locale_text: “这正是你失败的原因，烧坏了脸的猴子。你与你的其他做人一样，你们的思想过于狭隘。”

languages.text: "Und darin liegt der Grund für Euer Versagen, verbrannter Chem-Pan-Sey. Euer Verstand war zu beschränkt, wie der Verstand Eurer Spezies es meist ist."
languages.original_text: "And therein lies the reason for your failure, burnt mon-keigh. Your mind was narrow, as the minds of your kind are wont to be."

traits.locale_text: "Und darin liegt der Grund für Euer Versagen, verbrannter Chem-Pan-Sey. Euer Verstand war zu beschränkt, wie der Verstand Eurer Spezies es meist ist."

languages.text: «Y esa es la razón por la que no lo haya conseguido, mon-keigh quemado. Su mente se limitó a una sola cosa, como le suele pasar a los de su especie».
languages.original_text: "And therein lies the reason for your failure, burnt mon-keigh. Your mind was narrow, as the minds of your kind are wont to be."

traits.locale_text: «Y esa es la razón por la que no lo haya conseguido, mon-keigh quemado. Su mente se limitó a una sola cosa, como le suele pasar a los de su especie».

languages.text: 「あなたがしくじった理由はそこにある、焼かれたモン＝ケイよ。お前たち種族がずっとそうだったように、その視界は狭いものだったのだ」
languages.original_text: "And therein lies the reason for your failure, burnt mon-keigh. Your mind was narrow, as the minds of your kind are wont to be."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたがしくじった理由はそこにある、焼かれたモン＝ケイよ。お前たち種族がずっとそうだったように、その視界は狭いものだったのだ」

languages.text: "İşte hatan da orada yanık mon-keigh. Soydaşların gibi senin de aklın kıt."
languages.original_text: "And therein lies the reason for your failure, burnt mon-keigh. Your mind was narrow, as the minds of your kind are wont to be."

traits.locale_text: "İşte hatan da orada yanık mon-keigh. Soydaşların gibi senin de aklın kıt."
